nodes.text: Aïda Mashaka Croal is a television writer who, along with Matt Michnovetz, wrote four un-produced episodes of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. Following the cancellation of The Clone Wars, the episodes—"The Enemy of My Enemy," "A Tale of Two Apprentices," "Proxy War," and "Showdown on Dathomir"—were adapted into the four-part comic book series Star Wars: Darth Maul—Son of Dathomir in 2014.
